result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jessica M Hoffmann

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Jessica M Hoffmann in court with attorney Robert J. Penegor.  Barbara A. Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Dismissed and Read-in to:  13CF1267 and 14CF455.

Attorney Pengor appeared by phone.

Defendant Jessica M Hoffmann in court with attorney Robert J. Penegor by phone.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern, Christine Bohn, appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense requests adjournment to take care of some personal issues.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 13, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 9, 2014 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Jessica M Hoffmann in court with attorney Robert J Penegor.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense requests this matter be set for plea and sentencing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 9, 2014 at 10:00 am.

Preliminary hearing on May 1, 2014 at 08:15 am.

Defendant waives 20 day time limit and requests preliminary hearing date.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 1, 2014 at 08:15 am..
Attorney Penegor appeared by phone.

Defendant Jessica M Hoffmann in court, in custody, with attorney Robert J Penegor by phone.   Barbara A Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant was found in the same car as her codefendant after his hearing before this court this afternoon.  Both parties violated their bail.  Court orders cash bail in 13CF1267.  Bail in this matter to remain as fixed.
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 15, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jessica M Hoffmann in court with attorney Robert J Penegor.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern, Melissa Zilavy, appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Plea/sentencing hearing on February 26, 2014 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Jessica M Hoffmann in court with attorney Robert J Penegor.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern, David Herring, appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense requests plea and sentencing date.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 26, 2014 at 10:00 am.
Hearing on January 23, 2014 at 10:30 am.

Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  Defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol. Bond to be signed by 01/10/2014.  Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing by 01/10/2014.

Attorney Robert J Penegor in court.   Defendant Jessica M Hoffmann did not appear.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant could not appear today.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for January 23, 2014 at 10:30 am.
